author: hsiaowei
content:
Updated Electra test vectors to latest `dev` branch commit (`88f5dde`)
See Spec test vectors - 2024/04/12:
https://notes.ethereum.org/6wvK1EbQQuyHlZNzCopOyA?view#Spec-changes-for-pectra-devnet-0

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Any plans for PeerDAS test vectors?

author: parithosh
content:
The pectra-devnet-0 doc has been updated with the latest EIPs added yesterday: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-0 as per the meta-eip merged in yesterday: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8403

Do we want to stick to all EIPs going in devnet-0? Or do we want to choose all EIPs - the bigger ones?

author: ralexstokes
content: why not aim for all of them?

author: parithosh
content: just a question of time, if it feels like there's a ~0% chance we'd have any clients ready with all EIPs before interop, then we could start smaller and get some testing cycles in earlier for EIPs that are ready

author: ralexstokes
content: id aim for fewer bigger ones if thereâ€™s a question

author: bridge-bot
content: <timbeiko> Agreed, but I'd also like to aim for "everything before interop". Not sure how possible it is to get a similar implementation ordering across all the client teams, though?

author: lightclient
content: are any clients worried about not coming to interop with all eips impl'd?

author: lightclient
content:
i think geth is looking pretty good across all the eips, maybe a week of consolidation work to get One Good Branch?

speaking of consolidations, are we doing that on the EL?
